resources.string:
Aperture (PROJECT: Evo), a material design gallery replacement developed by Marlon Jones.
Google Play   Google+   GitHub   Source Code

To report any bugs, please email marlonjones234@gmail.com, or Join the community :)

This Version of Aperture/PROJECT: Evo is in ALPHA form, and is still in early development. Some things will not work, and many things right now are either very buggy or have not yet been implemented. This is intended only for those that wish to aid in the development of Aperture.
